ai_description.integration: Firecrawl's integration with Boltic streamlines web data workflows by enabling you to crawl, map, search, scrape, batch_scrape, and monitor statuses, while its AI-powered extract and extract_status operations pull specific fields or entities for seamless data structuring within Boltic pipelines.
